info.title: Swagger-UI
info.description:
## Welcome to swagger.nova.scapp.io
Use this swagger-ui instance as you see fit. 
You may simply link to swagger files using the ``url`` 
query param.

You can find links to our APIs in the [gravity-plattform registry](https://gravity-platform-registry.nova.scapp.io/ui/).

200.description: Open swagger-ui at the specified url.
